Song.title: How Deep the Father's Love for Us

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [(5/4)]How d[D]eep the Father’s [Em]love for [G]us How [D/F#]vast beyond all [D/A]meas[A]ure That [D]He should give His [Em]only S[G]on To [D/F#]make a wretch His tr[A]eas[D]ure How [D/F#]great the pain of [Em]searing l[G]oss The [D/F#]Father turns His [Bm]face aw[A]ay As [D]wounds which mar the C[Em]hosen [G]One [(3/4)]Bring [D/F#]many sons to g[A]lor[| D]y [| G/B | D/A | G2 |]
VERSE 2: [(5/4)]Be[D]hold the Man up[Em]on a c[G]ross My [D/F#]sin upon His [D/A]should[A]ers Ash[D]amed, I hear my [Em]mocking v[G]oice Call [D/F#]out among the sc[A]off[D]ers It [D/F#]was my sin that [Em]held Him th[G]ere Un[D/F#]til it was acc[Bm]ompl[A]ished His d[D]ying breath has br[Em]ought me l[G]ife [(3/4)]I [D/F#]know that it is f[A]i-n[| D]ished [| G/B | D/A | G2 |]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [(5/4)]I [D]will not boast in [Em]anyth[G]ing No [D/F#]gifts, no pow’r, no [D/A]wisd[A]om But [D]I will boast in [Em]Jesus Chr[G]ist His [D/F#]death and resurr[A]ect[D]ion Why [D/F#]should I gain from [Em]His rew[G]ard? I [D/F#]cannot give an [Bm]answ[A]er But [D]this I know with [Em]all my h[G]eart [(3/4)]His [D/F#]wounds have paid my r[A]ans[| D]om [| G/B | D/A | G2 |] (Ending) [| D | G2 | D | G2 | D |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 how deep the fathers love for us how vast beyond all measure that he should give his only son to make a wretch his treasure how great the pain of searing loss the father turns his face away as wounds which mar the chosen one bring many sons to glory verse 2 behold the man upon a cross my sin upon his shoulders ashamed i hear my mocking voice call out among the scoffers it was my sin that held him there until it was accomplished his dying breath has brought me life i know that it is finished verse 3 i will not boast in anything no gifts no powr no wisdom but i will boast in jesus christ his death and resurrection why should i gain from his reward i cannot give an answer but this i know with all my heart his wounds have paid my ransom ending

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: How d[D]eep the Father’s [Em]love [D/F#]for [G]us How [D/F#]vast beyond all [D/A]meas[A]ure That [D]He should give His [Em]on--l[D/F#]y S[G]on To [D/F#]make a wretch His tr[A]eas[D]ure How [D/F#]great the pain of [Em]sear[D/F#]ing l[G]oss The [D/F#]Father turns His [Bm]face aw[A]ay As [D]wounds which mar the C[Em]hos[D/F#]en [G]One Bring [D/F#]many sons to g[A]lor[D]y
VERSE 2: Be[D]hold the Man up[Em]on [D/F#]a cr[G]oss My [D/F#]sin upon His [D/A]should[A]ers Ash[D]amed, I hear my [Em]mock[D/F#]ing v[G]oice Call [D/F#]out among the sc[A]off[D]ers It [D/F#]was my sin that [Em]held [D/F#]Him th[G]ere Un[D/F#]til it was acc[Bm]ompl[A]ished His d[D]ying breath has br[Em]ought [D/F#]me l[G]ife I k[D/F#]now that it is f[A]i--n[D]ished
VERSE 3: I [E]will not boast in [F#m]an--[E/G#]y--th[A]ing No [E/G#]gifts, no pow’r, no [E/B]wisd[B]om But [E]I will boast in [F#m]Je--[E/G#]sus Chr[A]ist His [E/G#]death and resurr[B]ect[E]ion Why [E/G#]should I gain from [F#m]His [E/G#]re--w[A]ard? I [E/G#]cannot give an [C#m]answ[B]er But [E]this I know with [F#m]all [E/G#]my h[A]eart His [E/G#]wounds have paid my r[B]ans[E]om
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 how deep the fathers love for us how vast beyond all measure that he should give his only son to make a wretch his treasure how great the pain of searing loss the father turns his face away as wounds which mar the chosen one bring many sons to glory verse 2 behold the man upon a cross my sin upon his shoulders ashamed i hear my mocking voice call out among the scoffers it was my sin that held him there until it was accomplished his dying breath has brought me life i know that it is finished verse 3 i will not boast in anything no gifts no powr no wisdom but i will boast in jesus christ his death and resurrection why should i gain from his reward i cannot give an answer but this i know with all my heart his wounds have paid my ransom
